Service Details: - Dedicated to increasing inclusion of blind, deaf-blind and partially sighted Canadians in all aspects of social life, from employment to participation in elections - Members are blind, deaf-blind and partially sighted consumers and supporters from across the country, participate in working groups and committees, engage with local, city-based chapters, and engage in public awareness and education activities on a daily basis
